page.title: 16W.I. in Morchard Bishop
page.content: The village Women's Institute which will celebrate it's diamond jubilee in 1987 has links with Morchard in South Australia and Glen Ogilvie in Canada, the country which founded the movement.At monthly meetings we have had talks on food,District Council affairs,travel,cake icing,making use of material remnants also a business session to discuss county and national affairs as well as our own Institute. Three members attended courses at our own W.I. Denman College.Our present President is also a member of the Parish Council.We raised funds by coffee mornings and a raspberry cream tea in aid of the Lifeboat Institution for whom we collect.The annual subscription supports the national and county organisation as well as the institute.
